summary: Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behaviour of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family.
cast: Elisha Cuthbert|Camilla Belle|Edie Falco|Martin Donovan|Shawn Ashmore|Katy Mixon|David Gallagher|Shannon Woodward|Mj Vandivier|Jo Baker|Steve Uzzell|Ken Thomas|Rudy Costa|Myrna Cabello|Diane Quest|Quita Culpepper|Sharon Ploeger|Jamie Levels|Laura E. Johnston|Ashley|Michelle Brew|Ricky Cavazos|Mallory Culbert|A.J. Del Cueto|Troy Harris|Christopher Holt|Jennifer Holt|Kevin Holt|Nicole Holt|Landon Kash|Max Kruemcke|Angela Ware|Michele Williams
title: El silencio
